descriptionHtml:
Preparing for Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) Exam? Download the No. 1 Vernacular Test Series app #EduGorilla and get:
- 17,201+ mocks for 550+ competitive exams
- Questions that you would probably get in Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) Exam
- A multitude of Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) mocks, sectional tests, and previous year papers
- Tests in both English and Hindi

About Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) :

Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam is conducted online by the authorities of the Allahabad High Court, to select eligible candidates for various posts falling within Groups C & D. Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) is one of the most desirable exams in the Government sector. This app helps you to prepare for the Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam by providing the best online test series. You can practice mock tests of the Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam online and achieve success.

Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) App Details:

• Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam test series provides syllabus-wise unique questions based on the latest exam pattern
• Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) series by EduGorilla also helps to prepare for the exam and offer questions based on the latest syllabus
• Previous year papers and mock tests are also provided for better practice of Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam

Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) Online Test Series:

Practice Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) online test series only on EduGorilla. The test series is specially designed keeping in mind the level of Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exams. All the mock tests are based on the updated exam pattern and can be accessed 24x7 online.

In Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) Exam Mock Test:

Get more than 20 Mock Tests for Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam. The test series get updated on a regular basis. You will get new mock tests for Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exams that can be accessed online anywhere anytime. Sectional tests and topic wise mock tests are also given to help you practice more.

Key Features of EduGorilla’s Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) Test Series:

EduGorilla offers a lot of features in its Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) test series –
• Exams covered: Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D), Sectional Tests and Previous year papers
• More than 20 mock tests and sectional tests mock tests available
• 24×7 Online Access
• Personalized Performance Analysis of your mock test with All India & State Ranks
• Online Mock Tests as per the latest pattern; section-wise test papers

Subjects Covered:

Mathematics- Simplification, Approximation; Data Interpretation; Simple, Compound Interest; Profit, Loss; Area; Work; Time; Speed, Distance; Average; Permutation, Combination; Percentage; HCF, LCM; Problems on Ages; Bar/Pictorial Graph, Pie Chart; etc.
General Studies Indian History; Geography; Science, Technology; General Knowledge; Current Events of National and International Spheres; Art and Culture; Indian Politics; etc.
Hindi Language- Reading Comprehension; Synonyms; Antonyms; Cloze Test; Fill in The Blanks; Errors in the Sentences and Corrections; etc.
English language Reading Comprehension; Cloze Test; Para Jumbles; Synonyms; Antonyms; Fillers; Errors in the Sentences and Corrections; etc.

Alerts and Updates:

Get regular alerts and latest updates of the Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) exam in EduGorilla’s app, like exam notifications, important dates, syllabus, etc.
Practice mock tests, and various online topic-wise tests on the EduGorilla Allahabad HC Clerk (Group C & D) App.

creator: EduGorilla Test Series 4
descriptionHtml:
The Allahabad High Court or the High Court of Judicature at Allahabad is a high court based in Allahabad under the jurisdiction of Uttar Pradesh. To help the candidates with their recruitment exam preparation, we have introduced our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App to crack the exam.

Special Features 🤩 of EduGorilla's Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App
👉 Accessible 💻 24*7 from any & all devices
👉 Latest pattern Mock Tests 📖 & Current Affairs 📖 present in Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Practice Exam App
👉 10+ Mock Tests ⏳ with questions as per the latest exam pattern
👉 Smart user-interface that saves 40% of study time ⏱️
👉 Daily News 📖 provided for the latest issues
👉 Relevant Current Affairs 📖 for the exams
👉 Reminders for Regular Exam Updates 📖
👉 Daily Quiz ⏳ to test your preparation
👉 Detailed analysis 💡 and performance comparison 🤟 on State-Level basis
👉Accessible in Hindi & English✍️
👉 The best online exam preparation app available at modest price 🤩

Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) App Details
Our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App consists of all the required materials that are needed for cracking the examination. All the necessary subjects along with the online test series and study materials are loaded in our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) mock test app. Our materials and mock tests are designed by our team of expert faculties.
Our interface for the Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App is smart and user-friendly which helps the students to understand the concepts more easily. We have included the most likely questions in our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) practice test app that can appear for the exam. Thus our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App is one of the best online learning apps that helps candidates to crack the recruitment examination.

Subjects Covered in Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam
👉 Hindi: Synonymic words of Hindi and English, Prefix and Postfix, Antonym, Synonym, Suffix, Words with more than one meaning, Verb, Adjective, Idioms and Phrases, Simple, Compound, and Complex Sentences, One Word Substitution.
👉 English: Direct and Indirect Speech, Vocabulary, Idioms and Phrases, Fill in the Blanks, Synonyms, Antonyms, Tenses, Comprehension, One-Word Substitution, Active and Passive Voice, Transformation of Sentences.
👉 General Studies: Indian Economy, Indian Polity, Environmental Issues, Indian Geography, Geography of Allahabad, Indian Constitution, Current Affairs- National and International, History- India and World, Science and Technology.

The Allahabad High Court or the High Court of Judicature at Allahabad is a high court based in Allahabad under the jurisdiction of Uttar Pradesh. To help the candidates with their recruitment exam preparation, we have introduced our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App to crack the exam.

Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) App Details
Our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App consists of all the required materials that are needed for cracking the examination. All the necessary subjects along with the online test series and study materials are loaded in our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) mock test app. Our materials and mock tests are designed by our team of expert faculties.
Our interface for the Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App is smart and user-friendly which helps the students to understand the concepts more easily. We have included the most likely questions in our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) practice test app that can appear for the exam. Thus our Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Preparation App is one of the best online learning apps that helps candidates to crack the recruitment examination.

Subjects Covered in Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam
👉 Hindi: Synonymic words of Hindi and English, Prefix and Postfix, Antonym, Synonym, Suffix, Words with more than one meaning, Verb, Adjective, Idioms and Phrases, Simple, Compound, and Complex Sentences, One Word Substitution.
👉 English: Direct and Indirect Speech, Vocabulary, Idioms and Phrases, Fill in the Blanks, Synonyms, Antonyms, Tenses, Comprehension, One-Word Substitution, Active and Passive Voice, Transformation of Sentences.
👉 General Studies: Indian Economy, Indian Polity, Environmental Issues, Indian Geography, Geography of Allahabad, Indian Constitution, Current Affairs- National and International, History- India and World, Science and Technology.
👉 Mathematics: Number Systems, Discount, Percentage, Ratio and Proportion, Whole Numbers, Use of Tables and Graphs, Time and Distance, Time and Work, Mensuration, Decimals and Fractions, Profit and Loss, Interest, Averages, Ratio and Time.

Allahabad High Court Clerk (Group C &D) Exam Pattern
👉 Mode of Exam: Offline
👉 Duration: 90 minutes
👉 No. of Questions: 100
👉 Total Marks: 100
